statements: DELETE FROM data_subject_requests WHERE request_type = 'Access' AND request_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM data_requests WHERE request_type = 'delete' AND request_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM access_requests WHERE request_type = 'Data Deletion';
DELETE FROM data_corrections WHERE data_subject_id = 1001 AND correction_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM correction_requests WHERE data_subject_id = 201 AND request_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM information_access_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' AND request_date < '2022-01-01';
